title: Sɔpɔt Ɔrbital Tɛmpl - Join di Mishɔn
heading: Sɔpɔt Ɔrbital Tɛmpl
vision: Na Novɛmba 28, 2025 , Ɔbital Tɛmpl go lans frɔm India wit wan ISRO rɔket. Wan patisipetiv art sataylayt frɔm di Globɛl Sawt, na wan monumɛnt fɔ radikal inklushɔn, wan ples fɔ ɛdyukeshɔn, ɛn na katalis fɔ glob ɔl tɔk bɔt di fiuja fɔ di oli tin dɛn insay di ej fɔ teknɔlɔji, AI ɛn spɛs ɛksplɔrɔshɔn.

accomplished.heading: Wetin Wi Dɔn Du
accomplished.content: Afta 4 ia we dɛn dɔn du risach ɛn divɛlɔp, di mishɔn dɔn rɛdi. Wi dɔn dɔn di hadwɔd ɛn sɔftwɛl divɛlɔpmɛnt fɔ di sataylayt, pas ɔfishal shek tɛst dɛn we dɛn nid fɔ gɛt flayt sɛtifiket, ɛn dɔn wi kɔntrakt wit ISRO. Dɛn bil di sataylayt. Di teknɔlɔji de wok. Wi dɔn klia fɔ lanch.

funding.heading: Fɔ Gɛt Fɔ Gɛt Fɔ Gɛt fɔ Gɛt

needs.heading: Wetin Wi Nid Sɔpɔt Fɔ
needs.intro: Fɔ kɔmplit dis istri mishɔn ɛn maksimayz in impak, wi nid sɔpɔt fɔ fayv impɔtant kɔmpɔnɛnt dɛn:

decade.heading: Di Tɛn ia we De Bifo
decade.intro: Dis mishɔn nɔ de dɔn Novɛmba 28, 2025. I jɔs bigin.
decade.paragraph1: Fɔ di nɛks 10 ia , dis sataylayt go de rawnd di wɔl, ɛn i go ansa di nem dɛn we dɛn kin sɛn frɔm ɔl di kɔna dɛn na di planɛt. Di edyukeshɔn program gɛt fɔ du wit fɔ tren bɔku bɔku titi dɛn pan sataylayt tɛknɔlɔji, we go brok di Space Gap fɔ di Globɛl Sawt. Di dokyumɛnti go rich bɔku bɔku pipul dɛn ɔlsay na di wɔl, ɛn dis go mek pipul dɛn tɔk bɔt fɔ bi pat pan pɔsin, fɔ mɛmba sɔntin, ɛn fɔ di tin dɛn we oli.
decade.paragraph2: Orbital Temple de patna wit Sathi Roy ɛn The Roy Foundation fɔ mek dis vishɔn we dɔn de fɔ tɛn ia, impɔtant pan kɔlchɔ. Di Roy Fɔdayshɔn na wan ɔganayzeshɔn we nɔ de du biznɛs fɔ mek pipul dɛn gɛt mɔ akses to spiritual ɛdyukeshɔn, imɔshɔnal hilin, ɛn kɔnshɛns tul dɛn fɔ di kɔmyuniti dɛn we nɔ gɛt bɛtɛ savis ɔlsay na di wɔl, we de brij di ol sɛns ɛn di mɔdan tɛknɔlɔji fɔ mek wan wɔl we gɛt mɔ kɔnshɛns, kɔnɛkt, ɛn sɔri-at. Tugeda, wi de bil di infrastrakcha fɔ mek shɔ se Orbital Temple bi wan muvmɛnt we go de sote go we de rich di kɔmyuniti dɛn ɔlsay na di wɔl.
decade.paragraph3: Yu sɔpɔt nɔ jɔs de fɔnd fɔ wan lonch; i de mek wan muvmɛnt we go ɛko fɔ tɛn ia ɛn inspɛkt di nɛks jɛnɛreshɔn fɔ spɛs atis ɛn injinia dɛn.

launch.description: Di rial lonch bin kɔst insay di ISRO rɔket Novɛmba 28, 2025 . Dis de sɛn Ɔbital Tɛmpl insay ɔbit, usay i go de fɔ tɛn ia as patisipetiv art sataylayt ɛn tɛmpul na di skay, we ɛnibɔdi na di wɔl kin akses.

education.title: Fɔ gi mɔni fɔ di Edukeshɔnal Program
education.description: Divɛlɔp ɛn lanch di kɔmplit mɔltilingwal kɔs we de tich Globɛl Sawt titi dɛn aw fɔ bil sataylayt. Inklud di kɔrikulumɛ divɛlɔpmɛnt, vidio prodakshɔn, pletfɔm ɔstɔ, ɛn di fɔs ia fɔ skɔlaship fɔ studɛnt dɛn we nɔ gɛt bɛtɛ savis. Krio infrastrakcha we go las fɔ spɛshal ɛdyukeshɔn.
education.benefits: Yu kin gɛt: "Education Founding Sponsor" rɛkɔgnishɔn · Skɔlaship dɛn na yu nem · Dɛn kin sho am na ɛdyukeshɔn matirial · Mit di fɔs kɔhɔt fɔ studɛnt dɛn we yu skɔlaship dɔn gi mɔni fɔ (virtual ɔ in-pɔsin) · Dokumɛntri ficha sɛgmɛnt · Fɔ tɔk chans na lonch ivin dɛn · Risit we dɛn kin pul taks pan

docPreProd.description: Fɔnd di fɔs pat pan "Wetin Mek Tɛmpl?" dokyumɛnti. Inklud fɔ du 2 dip intavyu na India wit di lida dɛn we de tink ɛn di wan dɛn we de du spiritual tin, fɔ travul wit smɔl kru ɛn fɔ prodyuz, ɛn fɔ ɛdit di fim dɛn we dɛn bin dɔn mek bifo dɛn mek am. Dis faz de establish di dokyumentri in fawndeshɔn ɛn validet di kriyaytiv dairekshɔn.

docProd.description: Komplit prodakshɔn ɛn post-prɔdakshɔn fɔ "Wetin Mek Tɛmpl?" , di fichu dokyumɛnti we de ɛksplɔrɔ di intasekshɔn fɔ art, teknɔlɔji, ɛn di oli tin dɛn. Inklud fɔ fim na bɔku kɔntri dɛn, ɔda intavyu wit di lida dɛn we de tink, fɔ ɛdit ɔlsay, fɔ gred kɔlɔ, fɔ dizayn sawnd, ɛn fɔ sho di fim fɔ di fɔstɛm na India ɛn NYC .

artCollector.title: Bi di Onli Ɔrbital Tɛmpl At Kɔlɛkta
artCollector.imageAlt: Orbital Tempul instɔleshɔn na Mercosul Biɛnial
artCollector.imageCaption: Orbital Tempul na di 13th Mercosul Biennial, Poto Alegre. Na Klara Maks tek di pikchɔ.
artCollector.paragraph1: Dɛn bin bil tri sataylayt dɛn we fiba fɔ dis mishɔn. Wan go lanch na di spes Novɛmba 28, 2025. Wan de travul go na di myuziɔm ɛgzibishin dɛn ɔlsay na di wɔl. Wan na fɔ wan jenaros kɔlektor we want fɔ fund dis vishɔn ɛn gɛt wan pat pan spɛs art istri.
artCollector.paragraph2: Dis nɔto kɔpi; na wan pan di tri ɔrijinal sataylayt dɛn. Wan spɛshal ship we de wok ful wan we na skapul bak . Di sataylayt gɛt 5cm3 ɛn i we 245g , wit wan dome we dɛn mek wit gold .
artCollector.paragraph4: As di pɔsin we de gɛda di tin dɛn, yu go gɛt di sem instɔleshɔn we dɛn mek fɔ di 13th Mercosul Biennial , we na wan kɔmplit myuziɔl displei we de sho di sataylayt as ɔl tu di art ɛn teknɔlɔji. Dis instɔleshɔn dɔn de na big intanashɔnal venyu dɛn ɛn i ripresent di ays standad fɔ spɛs art prɛzɛntɛnshɔn.
artCollector.paragraph5: Yu sɔpɔt de ɛp fɔ fund di ɔl vishɔn: di lonch, di edyukeshɔn program, ɛn di dɔkyumɛntri we go mek pipul dɛn tɔk bɔt di oli tin dɛn na di wɔl bɔt di oli tin dɛn insay di tɛm we tɛknɔlɔji, AI ɛn spɛs ɛksplɔrɔshɔn de. Yu nem kin kam fɔ miks wit dis istri mishɔn fɔ ɔltɛm.

gratitude.heading: Wit Tɛnki to Wi Sɔpɔta dɛn
gratitude.intro: Orbital Temple na institiushɔn dɛm, pipul dɛm, ɛn pipul dɛm we biliv pan radikal inklushɔn we ɔndastand se art de mek di imajinari dɛm tumara bambay.

pearmill.title: Fɔund Sɔpɔta
pearmill.description: Pearmill na wan pan di fastest-growing pefomans makɛt ɛjɛnshi dɛm na di US, wan grup fɔ disayna, makɛt, ɛn injinia dɛm we de wok togɛda fɔ ɛp fɔ gro sɔm pan di mɔs aykɔnik statap dɛm na di wɔl. Dɛn jenaros sɔpɔt bin mek di Orbital Temple tim ebul fɔ bay impɔtant kɔmpɔnɛnt dɛn ɛn divɛlɔp di opin-sɔs hadwae we de mek dis sataylayt mishɔn pɔsibul.

gratitude.yourName: Yu nem kin de ya. Join wi fɔ mek istri.

people.heading: Di Pipul dɛn we De Biɛn Dis Mishɔn
people.intro: Orbital Temple na 10 ia kɔmitmɛnt. Na tu pipul dɛn de lid am we dɔn spɛn dɛn layf fɔ brij art, teknɔlɔji, ɛn mɔtalman kɔnɛkshɔn, ɛn we de bil di infrastukchɔ fɔ sɔpɔt dis vishɔn fɔ di tɛn ia we de kam.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni we de wok fɔ di kɔmni
edson.paragraph1: Edson na atis ɛn teknɔlɔjis we de fɛn ɔl di intimacy we mɔtalman gɛt na di intasekshɔn fɔ art ɛn teknɔlɔji. In prɛktis de span akitekchral instɔleshɔn, poem, foto, ɛn sataylayt tɛknɔlɔji.
edson.paragraph2: Dɛn dɔn sho in wok na di 13th Mercosul Biennial (Brazil), IX Intanɛshɔnal Biennale (Uzbekistan), ɛn NTU Global Digital Art Prize (Singapore).
edson.paragraph3: Wit ova 20 ia na di fild fɔ art ɛn teknɔlɔji , i dɔn wok wit krietiv tim dɛn fɔ di 2016 Rio Olimpik ɛn Inta Amɛrikan Divɛlɔpmɛnt Bank . Proxxima Magazin bin kɔl am wan pan di 50 Brazilian pɔshɔnal dɛn we gɛt nyu tin dɛn fɔ du , i bin gɛt tu kɔnsɛkutiv IF Dizayn Awod (2017-2018) ɛn i bin bi Lumen Prayz Fiuchɔ Awod fainal. Dɛn dɔn sho in wok na tu tu ia dɛn ɛn dɛn dɔn sho am na Ludwig Miusiɔm fɔ Kɔntempɔray At (Budapest), Inhotim Instityut (Brazil), ɛn Dizayn ɛn Fashɔn Miusiɔm (Lizbɔn), wit ɛgzibit dɛn na Nyu Yɔk, Pekin, Singapɔ, Dubay, Rio de Janeiro, ɛn ɔda siti dɛn.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy bin de tɔk bɔt am
sathi.role: Fɔunda, Di Roy Fɔdayshɔn & Stratejik Patna
sathi.paragraph1: Sathi na di pɔsin we mek The Roy Foundation , we na wan nonprofit we de du fɔ mek pipul dɛn gɛt mɔ chans fɔ lan bɔt Gɔd biznɛs, fɔ mɛn pipul dɛn we dɛn de fil, ɛn fɔ mek pipul dɛn no bɔt sɔntin fɔ di kɔmyuniti dɛn we nɔ gɛt bɛtɛ ɛp ɔlsay na di wɔl. Di fawndeshɔn de patna wit skul dɛm, kɔlchɔ institiushɔn dɛm, ɛn lokal ɔganayzeshɔn dɛm fɔ sheb AI-pawa wɛlbɔdi tul dɛm, kɔmyuniti kɔrikulu, ɛn midia we de inspɛkt transfɔmeshɔn.
sathi.paragraph2: Wit bakgrɔn pan nyurosayns, kɔch, ɛn lidaship, Sathi dɔn bil ɛn lid tim dɛn ɔlsay na Nɔt Amɛrika ɛn India, we dɔn mek $600 milyɔn pan ɛni ia sɛl na wan venchɔ. I de bak di faunda fɔ OHM , we na dijital-fɔs spiritual muvmɛnt, Ko-Funda fɔ SUTE (wan dijital AI-driven ɔfis pletfɔm), ɛn i de wok as Advaysa ɛn Globɛl Ɛd fɔ Grɔw fɔ RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: As Bengali-Amɛrikan uman we de brij Istan ɛn Wɛstɛn filɔsofi, Sathi de briŋ wan spɛshal we fɔ si tin to spiritual ɛn atis muvmɛnt dɛn insay di 21st sɛntinari. Wit wan netwok we de gro we gɛt 65,000+ pipul dɛn we de fala am ɛn pas 40 milyɔn ɔnlayn impreshɔn dɛn , i de bil glob ɔl kɔmyuniti dɛn we de kɔnɛkt akɔdin to kɔlchɔ ɛn spiritual divayd dɛn.

people.together: Tugeda wit The Roy Foundation, wi de bil wan 10 ia mishɔn we de brij art, teknɔlɔji, ɛdyukeshɔn, ɛn di oli tin dɛm, stat wit wan sataylayt lonch pan Novɛmba 28, 2025, ɛn kɔntinyu wit wan muvmɛnt we go rich to kɔmyuniti dɛm we nɔ gɛt bɛtɛ savis ɔlsay na di wɔl ɛn inspɛkt di nɛks jɛnɛreshɔn.

join.heading: Join Wi
join.content: Dɛn bil di sataylayt. Di teknɔlɔji dɔn rɛdi. Dɛn dɔn sɛt di de we dɛn go lanch am: Novɛmba 28, 2025 . Dis na di tɛm fɔ jɔyn wan mishɔn we de imajin bak wetin art kin du, usay i kin go, ɛn udat i kin sav.

fundSpecific.heading: Fɔnd wan Spɛsifi k Kɔmpɔnɛnt ɔ Bi Fawndin Patna
fundSpecific.description: Pik wan pan di chans fɔ gi mɔni we de ɔp, aks bɔt fɔ bi di art kɔlektor, ɔ tɔk bɔt wan kɔstɔm spɔnsɔship we de alaynɛd wit yu vishɔn.

generalDonation.heading: Mek Kɔntribyushɔn we dɛn kin pul pan taks
generalDonation.description: Ɔl di kɔntribyushɔn dɛn, big ɔ smɔl, de sɔpɔt di mishɔn ɛn dɛn kin pul dɛn taks tru wi fiskal spɔnsɔ, Di Fild.

taxInfo.heading: Giv we dɛn kin pul pan taks
taxInfo.paragraph1: Orbital Temple na wan fiskal spɔnsɔ projɛkt fɔ The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , wan 501(c)(3) nɔ-profit ɔganayzeshɔn we de na Nyu Yɔk. Ɔl di kɔntribyushɔn dɛn we di Amɛrika kin gi, dɛn kin pul dɛn taks te to di mak we di lɔ alaw.
taxInfo.paragraph2:
